item.title: Remotely reset your Android device
item.description: You have the phone or tablet with you and you have attempted to factory reset it to no avail. Fret not! If the device has Play Store and you are signed in, you may still be able to reset it.

item.title: Antivirus for Android
item.description: I believe most people have antivirus running on their PC/notebook especially if they are on Windows. Somehow most people do not seem to have the same urge to have one on their mobile.
